A paint bubble near the front badge and a crack in the windshield are shown in detail in the gallery.

Silver 16″ five-spoke alloy wheels are mounted with BFGoodrich g-Force tires. Braking is handled by four-wheel ventilated discs. A brake fluid flush was performed in March 2024.
